info.name: Evently - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Evently backend with all endpoints organized by functionality and access level.

item.name: üìä Analytics
üîí Admin Analytics

request.description: Get comprehensive dashboard metrics across all domains (events, bookings, users, etc.)
Get analytics across all events - performance metrics, trends, etc.
Get detailed analytics for a specific event - bookings, revenue, seat utilization, etc.
Overall tag analytics - usage statistics, performance metrics
Tag popularity metrics - most used tags, booking correlations
Tag trends over time - seasonal patterns, growth trends
Compare tag performance - revenue, bookings, user engagement
Overall booking analytics - total bookings, revenue, conversion rates
Daily booking statistics - daily trends, peak booking times
Cancellation rates and analysis - patterns, reasons, impact
User behavior analytics - registration trends, activity patterns
User retention metrics - churn rates, lifecycle analysis
User demographics breakdown - age groups, preferences, behavior segments

item.description: Admin-only analytics endpoints requiring admin authentication

request.description: Personal analytics for the authenticated user - spending patterns, preferences
User's booking history with analytics insights - patterns, recommendations
